caption.p: Anti-inflammatory activity of diclofenac, ellagic acid, and T. bellirica fruit extracts in heat-induced albumin denaturation assay. (A) Percentage albumin denaturation inhibiton by diclofenac and ellagic acid; (B) Percentage albumin denaturation inhibition by Tb fruit aqueous and ethyl acetate extracts. Results were expressed in mean ± SD.
